mapper.select: select left(sidoCode,2) sidoCode, sidoName from sidocode order by sidoCode
select left(gugunCode,5) gugunCode, gugunName from guguncode where left(gugunCode,2) = #{sido} and gugunCode is not null order by gugunCode
select distinct dongName, dongCode from dongcode where left(dongCode, 5) = #{gugun} and dongName is not null order by dongName

select h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dongName, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, (select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)) recentPrice, ROUND(ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(POINT(#{lng}, #{lat}), POINT(h.lng, h.lat))/1000, 2) AS dist from houseinfo h left join sidocode si on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongcode,5) = left(gu.guguncode,5) where dongCode = #{word} order by dist

select h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.buildyear as buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dongName, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, cast(REPLACE((select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)), ",", "") as signed integer) recentPrice, cast((select area from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)) as DECIMAL(9,2)) area, ROUND(ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(POINT(#{lng}, #{lat}), POINT(h.lng, h.lat))/1000, 2) AS dist from houseinfo h left join sidocode si on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongcode,5) = left(gu.guguncode,5)
order by ${rankKey}
desc
limit 10

select h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dongName, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, (select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)) recentPrice, ROUND(ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(POINT(#{lng}, #{lat}), POINT(h.lng, h.lat))/1000, 2) AS dist from houseinfo h left join sidocode si on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongcode,5) = left(gu.guguncode,5)
order by dist limit #{start}, #{countPerPage}
